overview: Vera is now working as a make-up artist and gets to travel to Portugal to work on VT Productions, making the models look glamorous and gorgeous. The little nymph still loves having fun with the models however and takes any and every opportunity to get down and dirty with these stunning women, including her long time girlfriend Jo.  The petite minx is back and looks like she is made up with her new job! Get ready for Vera Unleashed!
title: Vera Unleashed On Location
